items.sentence: If for some reason they come early, please tell them to wait.
The story of a great flood is very common in world mythology.
I saw a number of old couples sitting on benches in the park.
Tom wasted his day waiting for something that never happened.
Tom went to Mary's school to give a talk to all the students.
Did Tom say that he thought that it would be easy to do that?
I refuse to believe we can't do anything about the situation.
You must remember to tell Tom everything you know about that.
Please keep me informed about whatever happens in my absence.
Tom believed the people in that small village were cannibals.
